colecciones.actasPoliticaMonetaria: Records of the Monetary Policy Meetings

banner.parrafo1: In its purpose of continuing to strengthen the mechanisms of institutional transparency and accountability to citizens, the Central Bank of Chile makes available to the public a new period of the historical Acts of the Board of Directors from 1968 to 1983. Their publication contributes to the study of the economic history of the country and a better understanding of citizens regarding the Bank's work.
